name: Aggravate Affliction
source: Pathfinder #82: Secrets of the Sphinx pg. 75
text: All recurring afflictions (those with a frequency,including curses, diseases, and poison) possessed by the targeted creature immediately trigger, requiring an immediate saving throw (as described in the affliction) to avoid suffering their effects. A successful saving throw does not count toward ending the affliction, and this extra save does not change the timing of the next save against the affliction. Afflictions without a frequency are unaffected by this spell.
text_zh: 目标生物所拥有的所有可反复发作的苦难（那些具有频率的，包括诅咒、疾病和毒素）会立即触发，需要立即进行豁免（如发作的苦难中所述）以避免遭受其影响。（对该法术）一次成功的豁免投骰不会计入结束苦难所需次数，并且这次额外的豁免不会改变下一次对抗苦难的豁免时间。没有频率的苦难效果不受该法术影响。
